1.name: Spiteful Renewal
1.desc: Gain health and lose conditions when you strike a foe below the health threshold (25%).

2.name: Death’s Embrace
2.desc: Inflict Vulnerability when you strike a foe below the health threshold (33%). Deal 25% more damage while downed.

3.name: Siphoned Power
3.desc: Gain might when you strike a foe below the health threshold (50%).

1.name: Spiteful Talisman
1.desc: Deal 5% increased damage to foes with no boons. Focus skills recharge 20% faster.

2.name: Reaper’s Might
2.desc: Life Blast and Plague Blast grant might.

3.name: Bitter Chill
3.desc: Chilling a foe inflicts vulnerability.

1.name: Chill of Death
1.desc: Cast Spinal Shivers on a foe when attacking them while their health is below the threshold (50%).

2.name: Death Shiver
2.desc: Constantly apply vulnerability to nearby foes while in death shroud.

3.name: Axe Training
3.desc: Axe skills deal 10% increased damage to crippled foes. Striking with Rending Claws recharges your other axe skills by a small amount (2%).

1.name: Signet Mastery
1.desc: Activating Signet of Locust when struck while below the health threshold (50%). Reduces recharge on signets by 20%. Activating a signet grants might.

2.name: Close to Death
2.desc: Increases 20% damage to enemies below the health threshold (50%).

3.name: Spiteful Spirit
3.desc: Cast Unholy Feast when entering death shroud.

1.name: Barbed Precision
1.desc: Critical hits have a 66% chance to cause bleeding. Increases bleed duration by 20%.

2.name: Furious Demise
2.desc: Gain fury when entering death shroud.

3.name: Target the Weak
3.desc: Increases 2% critical hit chance for each condition on your foe.

1.name: Toxic Landing
1.desc: Cast Corrosive Poison Cloud when you take falling damage. Reduce 50% fall damage and 20% Corruption recharge.

2.name: Weakened Shroud
2.desc: Cast Enfeebling Blood when entering death shroud.

3.name: Chilling Darkness
3.desc: Blinding a target will also apply chill.

1.name: Reaper’s Precision
1.desc: You have a 33% chance to gain life force on critical hits.

2.name: Path of Corruption
2.desc: Dark Path now additionally convert boons into conditions.

3.name: Banshee’s Wail
3.desc: Reduces recharge on warhorn skills by 20% and increases their effect durations by 50%.

1.name: Lingering Curse
1.desc: While wielding a scepter your condition damage +150 and outgoing condition condition duration is increased by 100%.

2.name: Parasitic Contagion
2.desc: 15% of your condition damage heals you.

3.name: Terror
3.desc: Fear deals damage; it deals additional damage if the target is afflicted with another condition.

1.name: Armored Shroud
1.desc: Gain 180 toughness while in death shroud.

2.name: Soul Comprehension
2.desc: Your passive life-force generation from nearby deaths is increased by 20%.

3.name: Beyond the Veil
3.desc: Whenever you leave Death Shroud you and your minions gain protection.

1.name: Flesh of the Master
1.desc: Minions have 50% increased health. Gain 20 bonus toughness for each minion you control.

2.name: Shrouded Removal
2.desc: Lose a condition when you enter death shroud.

3.name: Putrid Defense
3.desc: Take 10% less damage from poisoned foes.

1.name: Greater Marks
1.desc: Increases area of marks and marks become unblockable.

2.name: Reaper’s Protection
2.desc: When disabled, inflict fear on nearby foes.

3.name: Deadly Strength
3.desc: Gain 7% power based on your toughness. Power gain doubles while in Death Shroud.

1.name: Death Nova
1.desc: Minions explode in a cloud of poison when they die. This effect also triggers when you are downed. When you kill an enemy, summon a Jagged Horror minion to fight by your side.

2.name: Necromantic Corruption
2.desc: Minions deal 25% more damage and take conditions from you. Whenever a minion attacks it transfer conditions to its target (10s cooldown per minion).

3.name: Unholy Sanctuary
3.desc: Regenerate health while in death shroud. If your life force is above the threshold (10%), your death shroud will activate if you would take a lethal blow.

1.name: Full of Life
1.desc: Gain regeneration when your health drops below the threshold (90%).

2.name: Vampiric
2.desc: Siphon health whenever you hit a foe. Minions siphon health and transfer it to you.

3.name: Blood to Power
3.desc: Gain 300 additional healing power while your health is below the threshold (75%).

1.name: Ritual of Life
1.desc: Create a Well of Blood when reviving an ally. Revive speed increased by 10%.

2.name: Bloodthirst
2.desc: Siphoning health is 20% more effective.

3.name: Mark of Evasion
3.desc: Leave a Mark of Blood when you dodge.

1.name: Quickening Thirst
1.desc: Increases 25% movement speed while wielding a dagger. Dagger skills recharge 33% faster when activated above the health threshold.

2.name: Vampiric Precision
2.desc: Siphon health whenever you critically hit.

3.name: Transfusion
3.desc: Life Transfer heals nearby allies.

1.name: Vampiric Rituals
1.desc: Wells siphon health every time they pulse and grant protection to allies when cast. Reduce recharge of wells by 20%.

2.name: Unholy Martyr
2.desc: Draw conditions from allies while in death shroud. Gaining life force each time a condition is drawn.

3.name: Deathly Invigoration
3.desc: Heal in an area when you enter death shroud.

1.name: Gluttony
1.desc: Increase life force gain from skills by 10%.

2.name: Last Gasp
2.desc: Gain Spectral Armor when your health falls below the threshold (50%).

3.name: Strength of Undeath
3.desc: You do more damage while above the life-force threshold (50%). Max Life-force increased by 15%.

1.name: Unyielding Blast
1.desc: Life Blast and Plague Blast pierce and cause vulnerability.

2.name: Soul Marks
2.desc: Marks generate 3% life force when triggered. Staff skills recharge 20% faster.

3.name: Speed of Shadows
3.desc: Increase 25% movement speed while in death shroud. Reduces 30% recharge on death shroud.

1.name: Spectral Mastery
1.desc: Reduce recharge on spectral skills by 20%. Spectral skills last 50% longer and grant lifeforce on use.

2.name: Vital Persistence
2.desc: Life force drains 50% slower while in death shroud. Death shroud skills recharge 15% faster.

3.name: Master of Terror
3.desc: Your fear effects have 50% increased duration. Inflict fear on foes when you are downed.

1.name: Foot in the Grave
1.desc: Gain stability and break stuns when you enter death shroud.

2.name: Death Perception
2.desc: Increases 50% critical-hit chance while in death shroud.

3.name: Dhuumfire
3.desc: Life Blast will inflict burning on your target.

1.name: Shroud Knight
1.desc: You can equip greatswords, and use reaper shouts. Death shroud is replaced with reaper's shroud, which has more melee oriented skills.

2.name: Shivers of Dread
2.desc: Whenever you inflict fear, you also chill.

3.name: Cold Shroud
3.desc: Cause your chill to 20% longer and reduce damage from chilled foes by 15%.

1.name: Augury of Death
1.desc: Shouts recharge 7% faster for each foe they hit.

2.name: Chilling Nova
2.desc: Critical hits against chilled foes cause an explosion that chill nearby foes. Cannot happen more than 3 times within 10 seconds.

3.name: Relentless Pursuit
3.desc: Reduce duration of movement impairing conditions. 66% reduction while in Reaper’s Shroud.

1.name: Soul Eater
1.desc: Cause your greatsword attacks to steal health. It also cause Gravedigger to recharge by 3% per foe hit.

2.name: Chilling Force
2.desc: Gain might and life force when you hit a chilled foe.

3.name: Decimate Defenses
3.desc: Striking a foe with vulnerability give you 2% critical hit chance per stack.

1.name: Blight’s Boon
1.desc: Gain lifeforce when you gain boon. If you are in reaper’s shroud, gain health instead.

2.name: Deathly Chill
2.desc: Cause chill to damage and deal more damage to foes below the health threshold (50%).

3.name: Reaper’s Onslaught
3.desc: Attack 15% while in Reaper’s Shroud. Killing a foe recharge Death’s Charge.
